text: Are you any better than the city of Thebes3:8. Literally, “No Amon,” the city of the Egyptian god Amen. It had earlier been destroyed by the Assyrians. on the River Nile, surrounded by water? Water was its defense, water was its wall.3:8. The Qumran pesher (commentary) on Nahum makes it clear that the pronoun refers to the city.
